channel.title: Accept multiple inputs for every commands
channel.description:
The `service delete` command accept a list of services. This is really convenient and we should have this for the following commands:
- start - stop - deploy
and maybe more if it make sense.
With that and with a `quiet` mode on the `service list` command we could do some stuff like in docker. `mesg-core service stop $(mesg-core service list -q)` to stop all the services. This would be perfect for developer experience,
